name: Pad Prik Sod Recipe (Thai Chili Chicken Stir-Fry)
description: This recipe for pad prik sod features tender meat, crunchy vegetables, and an irresistible stir-fry sauce.
recipeIngredient: 3.5 ounces chilies (Thai long chili, prik chi faa)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the red and green chilies, remove the seeds if you prefer a milder heat. Chop the white onions into large chunks. Cut the green onions into long pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the red and green chilies, remove the seeds if you prefer a milder heat. Chop the white onions into large chunks. Cut the green onions into long pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium heat. Sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium heat. Sauté minced garlic until fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and white sugar. Mix thoroughly before continuing.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, and white sugar. Mix thoroughly before continuing.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss in the sliced chilies and onions, stir-frying until the chicken is fully cooked, and the vegetables are tender to your liking, or 1–2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss in the sliced chilies and onions, stir-frying until the chicken is fully cooked, and the vegetables are tender to your liking, or 1–2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat and stir in the green onions until they are slightly wilted. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn off the heat and stir in the green onions until they are slightly wilted. Serve immediately.

keywords: chili chicken, pad prik sod, thai chili chicken stir-fry
